title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Sen. Josh Hawley, Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson, & Ami Horowitz | 5/6/21
description:
North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson joins to talk about his fight against critical race theory indoctrination in our schools. Sen. Josh Hawley calls in to review his new book, "The Tyranny of Big Tech," after Facebook upheld its ban on Trump. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz stops by to talk about his newest video, where he asked leftists on the street about taxing the rich.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson joins to talk about his fight against critical race theory indoctrination in our schools. Sen. Josh Hawley calls in to review his new book, "The Tyranny of Big Tech," after Facebook upheld its ban on Trump. Filmmaker Ami Horowitz stops by to talk about his newest video, where he asked leftists on the street about taxing the rich.
